What do we offer:

  • Car wash and polish

  • Restoration of the interior

  • Protective coatings: application of ceramics and protective membrane

  • Adhesion of decorative membranes: tinted glass, vinyl membrane for car body

About us

We are a young and energetic company specializing in car detailing. If you are looking for quality service and impeccable external condition of your car, you have come to the right place.

At AlexDetailing, we understand that your car is not just a means of transportation, it is part of your personality and status. Our task is to bring new life to it, restore its luster and shine, so that every trip becomes truly special.

Our highly trained professionals are highly experienced and use the latest methods and technologies to achieve amazing results. We pay special attention to detail and work with any type of car, from small city cars to luxury sports cars.

Our services

Car wash and polish:

We use special formulas and materials to make your car shine like new. We thoroughly clean and polish the bodywork, glass, chrome parts and wheels.

  • Wash
  • Polish
Call

Restoration of the interior:

We remove dust, dirt and stains, refresh fabric and leather surfaces, including seats, floor mats and ceiling. Your car will look and smell like it just left the factory.

  • Сleaning
  • Restoration
Call

Protective coatings:

We offer high quality protective coatings to keep your vehicle protected from environmental aggressors including dirt, UV radiation and scratches.

  • Application of ceramics
  • Protective membrane gluing
Call

Decorative coatings:

To make your car unique, we apply vinyl membranes to any parts of the body and interior of your car.

  • Adhesive decorative membrane
  • Sticking tinting
Call

At AlexDetailing, we pride ourselves on our professionalism, excellent customer service and commitment to excellence. Trust us with your car and we will do our best to exceed your expectations.

Sign up for our service now and we will be happy to meet you at our AlexDetailing garage. Your details deserve the best!

Our works

In our gallery you will find proof of our masterful work. We are proud of every car that has passed through our hands, and we want to share with you the results of our achievements.

We are ready to bring your car to perfect condition.
